hero.name: James Gangi
hero.title: Fullstack Software Engineer || Computer Science && Math
hero.subtitle: I am highly interested in all things technology and business related. Beyond coding, I work out, play chess, and love to ski! I'm open to trying new activities the same way that I'm willing to learn new tools and technologies most suitable for the job.
hero.description: Hey, I'm James Gangi, a full-stack software engineer based in Northern Virginia / Washington DC.

about.title: About
about.content: I'm passionate about creating software that improves lives.

professional.title: Professional Journey
professional.content: Throughout my career, I've worked with a diverse range of technologies and frameworks, focusing on creating efficient, maintainable, and user-friendly applications. My experience spans from front-end development with React and Angular to back-end systems using Node.js and .NET.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
skills: Skilled in ReactJS, AngularJS, TypeScript, .NET, C#, and Node.js.
Experience in caching, query optimization, and API efficiency.
Proficient in Micro Front-Ends and modular design.
Strong with GitHub, TFS, and CI/CD
Expertise in SQL, procedure deployment, and optimization.
